00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define TM_CAP_PRESCAELER           (20)
00048 #if 0
00049 #define SLAVE_RESTART_LATENCY       (2)
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #define TM_PWMOUT_FREQ_HZ           (2000)
00053 
00054 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 void TM_Capture_Configuration(void);
00056 void TM_Capture_MainRoutine(void);
00057 
00058 void TM_PWMOut_Configuration(void);
00059 
00060 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 u32 CaptureValue[2];
00062 vu32 wDutyCycle;       /* Duty Cycle in 16.16 fix point format                                              */
00063 vu32 wFrequency;       /* Frequency in 32.0 fix point format                                                */
00064 
00065 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00067   * @brief  Main program.
00068   * @retval None
00069   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00070 int main(void)
00071 {
00072   RETARGET_Configuration();
00073 
00074   TM_Capture_Configuration();
00075 
00076   TM_PWMOut_Configuration();
00077 
00078   while (1)
00079   {
00080     TM_Capture_MainRoutine();
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00085   * @brief  Timer Main Routine.
00086   * @retval None
00087   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00088 void TM_Capture_MainRoutine(void)
00089 {
00090   u32 wFrequencyInteger = wFrequency / 1000;
00091   u32 wFrequencyFraction = wFrequency % 1000;
00092   u32 wDutyCycleInteger = wDutyCycle >> 16;
00093   u32 wDutyCycleFraction = ((wDutyCycle & 0xFFFF) * 10000) >> 16;
00094   printf("CH0CCR = %d, CH1CCR = %d, ", CaptureValue[0], CaptureValue[1]);
00095   printf("Frequency = %u.%03u Hz, ", wFrequencyInteger, wFrequencyFraction);
00096   printf("Duty Cycle = %u.%04u %%\r", wDutyCycleInteger, wDutyCycleFraction);
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100   * @brief  Configures TM to capture waveform.
00101   * @retval None
00102   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00103 void TM_Capture_Configuration(void)
00104 {
00105   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00106     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00107     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00108     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_CAP_IPN = 1;
00109     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00110   }
00111 
00112   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00113   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CAP_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CAP_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00114 
00115   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00116 
00117     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00118        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00119        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00120     */
00121     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TM_TimeBaseInitStructure;
00122 
00123     TM_TimeBaseInitStructure.Prescaler = TM_CAP_PRESCAELER - 1;  // Timer clock = CK_AHB / TM_CAP_PRESCAELER
00124     TM_TimeBaseInitStructure.CounterReload = 0xFFFF;
00125     TM_TimeBaseInitStructure.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00126     TM_TimeBaseInitStructure.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00127     TM_TimeBaseInitStructure.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00128     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &TM_TimeBaseInitStructure);
00129   }
00130 
00131   /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                   */
00132   TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00133 
00134   { /* Channel n PWM input configuration                                                                    */
00135 
00136     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00137        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00138        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00139     */
00140     TM_CaptureInitTypeDef CapInit;
00141 
00142     TM_CaptureStructInit(&CapInit);
00143     CapInit.Channel = TM_CH_1;
00144     CapInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00145     CapInit.Selection = TM_CHCCS_DIRECT;
00146     CapInit.Prescaler = TM_CHPSC_OFF;
00147     #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00148     CapInit.Fsampling = TM_CHFDIV_1;
00149     CapInit.Event = TM_CHFEV_OFF;
00150     #else
00151     CapInit.Filter = 0x00;
00152     #endif
00153     TM_PwmInputInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &CapInit);
00154   }
00155 
00156   /* Set the STI trigger souece from the TI1S1, TM is configured as slave restart mode. The TM will be      */
00157   /* restarted on the rising edge of the TM channel 1.                                                      */
00158   TM_StiConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_TRSEL_TI1S1);
00159   TM_SlaveModeConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_SMSEL_RESTART);
00160 
00161   /* Set UGDIS = 1, disable the update event interrupt of the UEVG and slave mode, only counter             */
00162   /* overflow/underflow generations an update event interrupt function.                                     */
00163   TM_UEVG_IntConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, DISABLE);
00164 
00165   /* Enable TM Channel 1 Capture and Update Event interrupts                                                */
00166   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_CH1CC | TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00167   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_CAP_IRQn);
00168 
00169   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, ENABLE);
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00173  * @brief   This function handles GPTM0 interrupt.
00174  * @retval  None
00175  ************************************************************************************************************/
00176 void HTCFG_CAP_IRQHandler(void)
00177 {
00178   if (TM_GetIntStatus(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_UEV) != RESET)
00179   {
00180     /* Reset wFrequency and wDutyCycle                                                                      */
00181     TM_ClearIntPendingBit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_UEV);
00182     wDutyCycle = 0;
00183     wFrequency = 0;
00184   }
00185 
00186   if (TM_GetIntStatus(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_CH1CC) != RESET)
00187   {
00188     /* Clear GPTM1 Capture compare interrupt pending bit                                                    */
00189     TM_ClearIntPendingBit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_INT_CH1CC);
00190 
00191     /* Get the Input Capture value                                                                          */
00192     CaptureValue[1] = TM_GetCaptureCompare1(HTCFG_CAP_PORT);
00193 
00194     if (CaptureValue[1] != 0)
00195     {
00196       CaptureValue[0] = TM_GetCaptureCompare0(HTCFG_CAP_PORT);
00197 
00198       /* Compute wDutyCycle and wFrequency                                                                  */
00199       wDutyCycle = (((u64)(CaptureValue[0] + 1) << 16) * 100) / (u64)(CaptureValue[1] + 1);
00200       /* We want to get achieve three decimal places, so a magnification of 1000                            */
00201       wFrequency = ((u64)SystemCoreClock * 1000) / ((CaptureValue[1] + 1) * TM_CAP_PRESCAELER);
00202     }
00203     else
00204     {
00205       wDutyCycle = 0;
00206       wFrequency = 0;
00207     }
00208   }
00209 }
00210 
00211 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00212   * @brief  Configures TM to output PWM waveform.
00213   * @retval None
00214   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00215 void TM_PWMOut_Configuration(void)
00216 {
00217   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00218     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00219     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00220     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_IPN = 1;
00221     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00222   }
00223 
00224   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00225   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_AFIO_FUN);
00226 
00227   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00228 
00229     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00230        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00231        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00232     */
00233     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00234 
00235     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 1 - 1;                         // Timer clock = CK_AHB / 1
00236     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = SystemCoreClock / TM_PWMOUT_FREQ_HZ - 1;
00237     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00238     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00239     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00240     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00241     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00242     #if 0
00243     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00244     #endif
00245   }
00246 
00247   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00248 
00249     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00250        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00251        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00252     */
00253     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00254 
00255     OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_PWM_CH;
00256     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00257     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00258     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00259     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00260     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00261     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00262     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00263     OutInit.Compare = ((SystemCoreClock / TM_PWMOUT_FREQ_HZ) * (100 - 33)) / 100; // Duty cycle = 33 %
00264     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00265     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &OutInit);
00266   }
00267 
00268   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, ENABLE);
00269 }

00278 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00280   /*
00281      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00282      Debug message can be added here.
00283      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00284   */
00285 
00286   while (1)
00287   {
00288   }
00289 }
